tool_description: Domains and Subdomains Discovery API identifies all the domain names and/or subdomains containing specified search terms.
name: Domains and Subdomains Discovery
title: Domains and Subdomains Discovery

api_list.name: Domain/Subdomain Discovery
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://domains-and-subdomains-discovery.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "domains-and-subdomains-discovery.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
